name: Bee Rescue
description:
This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 50
THEME - DELAY THE INEVITABLE

You control a bee colony attacked by a lumberjack. Every strike of his axe makes inevitable death closer. The only chance to save the queen is to relocate her to another tree before the current tree falls. But every action consumes resources, ecpecially relocation.

Prepare a new tree for the queen, collect enough resources and move the queen to a safe place.

CONTROLS:

  • F to Fullscreen
  • R to restart
  • M to Mute
  • Mouse to click on action icons
